attributes.action: Require COVID 19 vaccination certificates for international travel.
attributes.additional_details:
To protect UK residents from further COVID 19 contamination and the import of new strains.

To protect the NHS and Key Workers.
attributes.background: Make it a legal requirement for those travelling out of the UK and into the UK to have a valid COVID 19 vaccination certificate

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Introduce a 'Vaccination Passport' for international travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574479

Proof of Covid vaccination should be mandatory for all air travel from the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561709
